sections.title: What is Competitive Coding?
sections.content: Competitive coding is a mind sport where participants solve algorithmic problems within time constraints. It's the foundation for technical interviews at top tech companies and helps develop critical problem-solving skills.

sections.title: Why Learn Competitive Coding?
sections.content:
• Technical Interviews: Most tech companies use algorithmic problems in interviews
  • Problem-Solving Skills: Develop systematic thinking and analytical abilities
  • Career Growth: Opens doors to top-tier companies and high-paying positions
  • Mental Agility: Improves coding speed and efficiency

sections.title: Popular Platforms
sections.content:
• LeetCode: Most popular for interview preparation
  • HackerRank: Good for beginners with structured learning paths
  • Codeforces: Advanced competitive programming contests
  • AtCoder: Japanese platform with regular contests

sections.title: Getting Started
sections.content: Start with easy problems on LeetCode (Easy difficulty) and gradually work your way up. Focus on understanding the problem-solving process rather than just memorizing solutions.
